1152.content:
You looked around, rubbing your skull gently and wincing at the pain. You noticed the immensely tall trees and grass. You heard the thundering quakes of what could only be someone's footsteps. You started crying for help, before realizing it was a Pokemon that started coming into view!

It was a gardevoir, and she towered over you, nearly stepping on you before she noticed your pleas for help.

"Hm?" She crouched down and eyed you carefully. "A human?!" Her eyes widened, a beautiful shade of rose red.

You started to panic, highly unsure of what was to come next. You were at her mercy. You considered running, but something about her voice had been soothing you... You stammered, "Y-yes... Please, can you-"

"Oh wonderful! This is perfect! I've been studying humans for a while now but could never get close enough... Although, now I can conduct my experiments with ease! er, um... I-if that's okay with you of course... Please? It would mean a lot to me!" She seemed so thrilled, you knew if you said 'no' that it would crush her heart. Reluctantly, you agreed to help her with her 'studies'.

"Oh excellent! Thank you so much tiny traveler!" She giggled softly and picked you up in her delicate, emerald hands. After a while, you arrived in a cave-like area. You weren't really sure what it was yet, but Gardevoir set you down and searched for something. "Aha! Found it!" She pulled out a small notepad and wrote something down. You watched as she toyed around with your arms and legs, constantly stopping to write things down.

"Oh, thank you so much! you've been really helpful to my research! Hm..." She sifted through some of her papers. "Well, this next experiment isn't on the list, but I'm absolutely curious to know... Would you mind if I conducted one final test?" You felt a little uneasy as she asked this, but she hadn't done anything too serious or harmful to you so far, so you felt like you could trust her. On the other hand, you're super tiny and her next experiment could be something about hurting you or even killing you! You had no idea what she was going to do!
